mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT POS_NAME FROM POSITION WHERE POS_NO = B.POS_NO) AS POSNAME , (SELECT SUB_REGION_NAME FROM SUB_REGION WHERE SUB_REGION_NO = B.SUB_REGION_NO) AS SUBREGIONNAME , A.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME , A.PHOTOURL AS PHOTOURL FROM USERS A LEFT JOIN PROFILE B ON A.PIN_NO = B.PIN_NO WHERE B.PIN_NO = #{pinNo}

SELECT (SELECT TITLE FROM RECRUIT WHERE RECRUIT_NO = A.RECRUIT_NO) AS TITLE , (SELECT POS_NAME FROM POSITION WHERE POS_NO = A.POS_NO) AS POSNAME FROM RECRUIT_POS A WHERE RECRUIT_POS_NO = #{recruitPosNo}
